price: 60. salvo a su mujer[439], ya que ha sido decretado que ella esté entre quienes reciban el castigo”.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: [439]  Ver la nota de la aleya 83 de la sura 7.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnā innahā lamina al-ghābirīna
